title: Online Workshop for Enhancing Communication Competencies for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic clinical practice experience and understanding of communication theories
context.additional_context: Non-real-time online education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, targeting pre-service/in-service teachers for language domain job training

learning_goals: Learners can apply proactive communication skills considering patient safety in various clinical scenarios
Learners can evaluate professional communication strategies in conflict situations through role-playing activities and identify areas for improvement
Learners can execute effective conversation techniques in team-based patient management using evidence-based communication frameworks

resources: LMS Platform (Video Lectures, Quizzes, Discussion Board Functionality)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
